GSD.description:
drm/amd/pm: fix double free in si_parse_power_table()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit ca1ce206894dd976275c78ee38dbc19873f22de9. For more details please see the references link.
